admit.title: UPSSSC PET Admit Card 2025 – Out
admit.excerpt: UPSSSC ने Preliminary Examination Test (PET) Admit Card 2025 जारी कर दिया है. Exam dates: 06-07 Sep 2025.
admit.content:
How to download: Visit official website upsssc.gov.in → Examination → Preliminary Eligibility Test admit card. Login with Registration No. & DOB.

Carry printed admit card and ID proof to exam center.

admit.title: SSC CGL Tier-I Exam City Details 2025
admit.excerpt: SSC released Exam City Details for CGL Tier-I 2025. Exam 12–26 Sep 2025.
admit.content: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the Exam City Details for the SSC CGL Tier-I Exam 2025. Candidates can check their Exam City Details using Registration Number, Enrollment Number, or Date of Birth by logging into the official SSC portal. Download the City Intimation Slip and take a printout for reference. For age limits, eligibility, and vacancy details, check the official SSC notification.

admit.title: RRB NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Admit Card / Exam City Details 2025
admit.excerpt: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) released Admit Card for NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Posts. Exam from 07 August – 08 September 2025.
admit.content: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released Admit Card for NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Posts. Candidates can check their Exam Date and Admit Card details using Enrollment Number / Registration Number / Date of Birth by logging into the official RRB portal. Download the admit card and take a printout for exam day reference. For eligibility, age limits, and vacancy details, check the official notification.

jobs.title: RPSC SI / Platoon Commander Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online for 1015 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) ने Sub Inspector / Platoon Commander भर्ती 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी की है। इसमें कुल 1015 पद हैं। आवेदन 10 अगस्त से 08 सितंबर 2025 तक होंगे।
jobs.eligibility: Graduation in any stream from a recognized university. Working knowledge of Hindi written in Devnagari Script and knowledge of Rajasthani culture is required.
jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online through the official RPSC website before 08 September 2025. Ensure to complete the fee payment and form submission before the last date.

Selection Process: Written Exam → PET & PST Test → Personal Interview → Document Verification → Medical Examination.

links.title: Check Category Wise Post Details Notice

jobs.title: BPSC School Teacher TRE 4.0 Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
jobs.excerpt: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) ने TRE 4.0 School Teacher भर्ती 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी कर दी है। इसमें कुल 27,910 पद हैं। आवेदन सितंबर 2025 से शुरू होंगे। परीक्षा 16-19 दिसंबर 2025 तक आयोजित होगी।

fees.Payment Mode: Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking / IMPS / Wallet

eligibility.Class 1 to 5: Bachelor Degree with 50% + B.Ed OR 10+2 with 2 Year D.El.Ed OR 4 Year BLEd OR CTET/BTET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 6 to 8: Graduate with D.El.Ed OR Graduate/Post Graduate with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR PG with 55% + 3 Year B.Ed-M.Ed
eligibility.Class 9 to 10 (TGT): Graduate/Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR STET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 9 to 10 (TGT-Special): Graduate/Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR STET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 11 to 12 (PGT): Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR PG with 55% + 3 Year B.Ed-M.Ed OR STET Paper II Qualified

jobs.content:
How to Apply: इच्छुक उम्मीदवार BPSC की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर जाकर सितंबर 2025 से ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन करने से पहले आधिकारिक अधिसूचना जरूर पढ़ें।

आवेदन के लिए पासपोर्ट साइज फोटो, हस्ताक्षर, शैक्षिक प्रमाण पत्र, जाति प्रमाण पत्र, आधार कार्ड और अन्य आवश्यक दस्तावेज अपलोड करने होंगे।

Selection Process: लिखित परीक्षा और दस्तावेज़ सत्यापन (DV)।

jobs.title: IB Junior Intelligence Officer Grade II Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online for 394 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Intelligence Bureau (IB) ने Junior Intelligence Officer Grade II भर्ती 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी की है। इसमें कुल 394 पद हैं। आवेदन 23 अगस्त से 14 सितंबर 2025 तक होंगे।

vacancyDetails.Post Name: IB Junior Intelligence Officer Grade II
Eligibility: Diploma in Engineering in Electronics / Electronics & Telecommunication / Electronics & Communication / Electrical & Electronics / IT / Computer Science / Computer Engineering / Computer Applications.
Bachelor’s Degree in Science with Electronics / Computer Science / Physics / Mathematics.

jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online through the official IB website before 14 September 2025. Ensure to complete the fee payment and form submission before the last date.

Selection Process: Written Exam (100 Marks) → Skill Test (30 Marks) → Interview Test (20 Marks) → Document Verification → Medical Examination.

jobs.title: Bihar BSEB Sakshamta Pariksha Phase 4th & 5th Recruitment 2025 (Re-Open)
jobs.excerpt: Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) ने Sakshamta Pariksha Phase 4th & 5th Recruitment 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी की है। आवेदन 06 से 11 सितंबर 2025 तक पुनः खुले हैं।

vacancyDetails.Eligibility: Teachers working in Primary, Middle, Secondary, or Higher Secondary Schools (including Physical Education Teachers) and Librarians appointed by local bodies in the state can apply.

jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online through the official BSEB website before 11 September 2025. Ensure to complete the fee payment and form submission before the last date.

Selection Process: Based on Written / Online Exam.

jobs.title: BPSC District Sports Officer DSO Recruitment 2025
jobs.excerpt: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) ने District Sports Officer (DSO) Recruitment 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी की है। कुल 33 पदों के लिए आवेदन 02 से 26 सितंबर 2025 तक आमंत्रित किए गए हैं।

vacancyDetails.Eligibility: Graduate with Diploma/PG Diploma in Sports Coaching from SAI, LNIPE Gwalior, Central Sports University, or UGC/Bihar recognized sports university. Candidate must also have sports achievements (International/National level representation or multiple participations in recognized championships).

jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online through the official BPSC website before 26 September 2025. Ensure to complete the fee payment and form submission before the last date.

Selection Process: Written Exam and Interview.

jobs.title: BPSC AEDO Recruitment 2025
jobs.excerpt: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) ने Assistant District Education Officer (AEDO) Recruitment 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी की है। कुल 935 पदों के लिए आवेदन 27 अगस्त से 26 सितंबर 2025 तक खुले हैं।

vacancyDetails.Eligibility: Candidates must have a graduate degree from a recognized university or an equivalent qualification. For complete details, please check the official notification.

jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online through the official BPSC website before 26 September 2025. Ensure to complete the fee payment and form submission before the last date.

Selection Process: Written Exam, Document Verification, and Medical Examination.

jobs.title: BPSC HOD Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online for 218 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the notification for Head of Department (HOD) Recruitment 2025. Total 218 vacancies in multiple engineering and professional subjects. Apply online from 02 September 2025 to 30 September 2025.
jobs.eligibility: Candidates must have a Ph.D. in the relevant discipline with First Class in B.E./B.Tech or M.E./M.Tech (or equivalent) and 12-15 years of teaching/research/industry experience depending on the subject.
jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online for BPSC HOD Recruitment 2025 between 02 September 2025 and 30 September 2025. Use the Apply Online link or visit the BPSC official website.

Mode of Selection: Based on Academic Background, Research Performance, Teaching Skills, and Interview.

jobs.title: IBPS RRB 14th Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online for 13217 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for RRB XIV (14) recruitment. Total 13,217 vacancies for Office Assistant, Officer Scale-I, II & III. Apply online from 01 September 2025 to 21 September 2025.
jobs.eligibility: Graduation required for all posts. Specialist posts require professional qualifications (CA, MBA, Law, IT, Agriculture, etc.) with relevant experience (1-5 years). Proficiency in local language and computer knowledge desirable.
jobs.content:
How to Apply: Candidates can apply online for IBPS RRB 14th Recruitment 2025 between 01 September 2025 and 21 September 2025. Use the Apply Online link or visit the IBPS official website.

Mode of Selection: Prelims Written Exam (All Posts), Mains Exam (Scale-I & Office Assistant), Interview (Scale-I, II, III only), Document Verification & Medical Examination.

jobs.title: IB Security Assistant (Motor Transport) Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
jobs.excerpt: Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) Intelligence Bureau (IB) has released notification for Security Assistant (Motor Transport) 2025 Recruitment. Total 455 vacancies. Apply online from 06 September to 28 September 2025.

jobs.title: Railway RRB Paramedical Staff Recruitment 2025 – 434 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released notification for Paramedical Staff Recruitment 2025. Total 434 vacancies. Apply online from 09 August to 18 September 2025.

eligibility.Radiographer: Diploma in Radiography / X-Ray Technician / Radiodiagnosis Technology
eligibility.Health & Malaria Inspector Grade-II: B.Sc with Chemistry + 1-year Diploma in Health/Sanitary Inspector
eligibility.ECG Technician: Degree / Diploma in ECG / Cardiology Technology

jobs.title: UPPSC Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025 – 1253 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released notification for Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025. Total 1253 vacancies. Apply online from 04 September to 06 October 2025.

eligibility.Education: Master’s degree in relevant subject with 55% marks + UGC NET qualification or Ph.D. as per UGC regulations

jobs.title: RPSC 1st Grade Teacher (Agriculture) Recruitment 2025 – 500 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released notification for 1st Grade Teacher (Agriculture) Recruitment 2025. Total 500 vacancies. Apply online from 04 September to 03 October 2025.

eligibility.Education: 4-year Bachelor’s in Agriculture/Horticulture (UGC) + Postgraduate degree in relevant subject + B.Ed. (NCTE recognized)
eligibility.Additional: Working knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and understanding of Rajasthani culture

jobs.title: Indian Army NCC 123rd Course April 2026 Online Form – 76 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Join Indian Army has released notification for NCC 123rd Special Entry Scheme April 2026 Course (Men & Women). Total 76 vacancies. Apply online from 12 August to 11 September 2025.

eligibility.NCC – C Certificate Holder: Bachelor’s degree in any stream with at least 50% marks + minimum 2-year NCC certificate. Final year candidates eligible.
eligibility.Ward of Battle Casualties: Bachelor’s degree in any stream with at least 50% marks.

documentsRequired: Widows of Defence Personnel proof (if applicable)

jobs.title: UP Police Sub Inspector (SI) Online Form 2025 – 4543 Posts
jobs.excerpt: Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has released notification for Sub Inspector, Platoon Commander posts. Total 4543 vacancies. Apply online from 12 August to 11 September 2025.

eligibility.Educational Qualification: Graduation degree from a recognized university or equivalent. Mandatory upload of mark sheets or provisional degree.
Preference Qualification: Passing 'O' Level Computer Examination by NIELIT or equivalent
Minimum 2 years service in Territorial Army

documentsRequired: Other special category certificates (PH, Ex-servicemen, etc.)
